name: Backrooms: Steps into the abyss
description:
How long can you hold out?
What if the mazes are very confusing?
What if everything drives you crazy?
What if you need food and water?
Can a person leave the backroom?

Key Features


  • Intricate level design
    You'll go crazy, but you won't be able to learn the map!
  • Immersive AI (Sight and Hearing)
    AI's behavior is utterly unpredictable. Even I can't anticipate its next move.
  • Online Co-op
    You can play in a team with friends
  • One life
    And no indulgences!
  • Stealth
    All your actions generate noise and attract attention.
